name: rateDidChangeNotification
desc: A notification that a player posts when its rate changes.

items.name: class let rateDidChangeOriginatingParticipantKey: String
items.desc: A key to retrieve the identifier of the participant that originates the rate change.

items.name: class let rateDidChangeReasonKey: String
items.desc: A key to retrieve the reason for the rate change.

items.name: struct AVPlayer.RateDidChangeReason
items.desc: A structure that represents a rate change reason.
